resources.string: The answer to your question is:

Have you ever had trouble deciding what to do? This app was made so that you easily can decide by getting a decision from an impartial party.

This application is made for entertainment purpose only. In the end, you can decide for your own if you want to follow its decision. You are responsible for your own actions.

Made by Kwarkbit (kwarkbit.com)
(c) 2011

Enter two or more alternatives you want to pick among and separate them with a colon (:)

For example: go to city:do homework

The application then selects one of the alternatives randomly.
